tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE books (
    book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    availability BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE books (
    book_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    author_id UUID,
    genre TEXT,
    release_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE books (
    book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author_id INT,
    genre_id INT,
    availability INT
);

CREATE TABLE books (
    book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author_id INT NOT NULL,
    genre_id INT NOT NULL,
    availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE books (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  author_id INT,
  genre_id INT,
  availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE authors (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  nationality VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE genres (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE availability (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  book_id INT,
  available_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE books_authors (
  book_id INT,
  author_id INT
)
